items.sentence: Put it in first and slowly let off the clutch while giving it a little gas.
She hired him as an interpreter because she had heard that he was the best.
Since it was getting even hotter, Tom peeled off another layer of clothing.
Tom says that he can drink a whole bottle of whiskey without getting drunk.
If Tom hadn\'t helped Mary, she wouldn\'t have stood a chance of surviving.
Mary thought that Tom would ask her to the prom, but he asked someone else.
Please remember to mail this letter on your way to school tomorrow morning.
If you don\'t want to have any more contact with Tom, that\'s fine with me.
If Tom had asked Mary for advice first, he wouldn\'t have had this problem.
It would be a pity if you missed out on seeing Tom while you\'re in Boston.
